thread.title: York County residents may have to deal heat and rain over next couple of days
thread.title_full: York County residents may have to deal heat and rain over next couple of days

author: , York Dispatch
title: York County residents may have to deal heat and rain over next couple of days
text: York County residents may have to deal heat and rain over next couple of days A heat advisory for York and surrounding counties remains in effect until 8 p.m. Friday but keep an eye on the sky for thunderstorms over the next couple of days. While the heat advisory ends Friday night, heat index readings could be as high as 100 degrees on Saturday. In addition to the heat impacts, thunderstorms could produce localized flooding and strong winds. Scattered strong thunderstorms accompanied by potentially damaging wind gusts and localized flooding could impact the area Saturday afternoon. There is a 70% chance of rain on Friday with new rainfall amounts between a tenth and a quarter of an inch. Otherwise, it will be partly sunny with a high near 91 and a heat index value of 101. MORE: [Trump claims US 'a dumping ground' at Harrisburg rally, first in Pa. since shooting](https://www.yorkdispatch.com/story/news/local/2024/08/01/trump-claims-us-a-dumping-ground-at-harrisburg-rally-first-in-pa-since-shooting/74634336007/) MORE: [79-year-old man dies after being struck by vehicle while walking in Springettsbury Twp.](https://www.yorkdispatch.com/story/news/local/2024/07/31/79-year-old-man-dies-after-being-struck-by-vehicle-while-walking-in-springettsbury-twp/74625090007/) MORE: [2024 York State Fair saw boost in attendance over last year, organizers say](https://www.yorkdispatch.com/story/news/local/2024/08/01/2024-york-state-fair-saw-boost-in-attendance-over-last-year-organizers-say/74618999007/) There is a 60% chance of rain Friday night. Otherwise, it will be mostly cloudy with a low around 73. Saturday, there is a 90% chance of rain, with new rainfall amounts between a quarter and a half an inch possible. Otherwise, the high will be near 91 degrees with a heat index value near 100. Rain chances remain high Saturday night with an 80% chance of showers. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and a quarter inch are possible. The low temperature will be near 72 degrees. [>> Please consider subscribing to support local journalism. ](https://cm.yorkdispatch.com/specialoffer/) Rain chances continue Sunday and after a break Monday, return Tuesday and Wednesday. Here is the outlook: Sunday: There is a 50% chance of showers and thunderstorms after 8 a.m. Otherwise, it will be partly sunny, with a high near 88. Sunday Night: There is a 30% chance of thunderstorms before 8 p.m. Otherwise, it will be partly cloudy, with a low of around 70. Monday: It will be sunny and hot, with a high near 93. Monday Night: It will be partly cloudy, with a low of around 70. Tuesday: There is a 30% chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2 p.m. Otherwise, it will be mostly sunny, with a high near 90. Tuesday Night: There is a 40% chance of showers and thunderstorms. Otherwise, it will be partly cloudy, with a low around 69. Wednesday: There is a 40% chance of showers and thunderstorms. Otherwise, it will be partly sunny, with a high near 85. Wednesday Night: There is a 30% chance of showers and thunderstorms. Otherwise, it will be partly cloudy, with a low around 65.
